update_message:
🚨 Critical Update Required! Version 2.0.0+2 includes important fixes:

✅ Downloads no longer reset to 0%
✅ Pause/Resume now works perfectly
✅ Video player stability improved

Please update now for the best experience!

maintenance.maintenance_message: We're updating our servers to serve you better. Please check back in a few minutes.

release_notes: 🎯 CRITICAL FIX: Downloads never reset to 0% anymore!
⏸️ FIXED: Pause/Resume functionality now works without errors
🔄 FIXED: Download progress preserved across app restarts and network issues
🚫 FIXED: Backward progress detection prevents server restart issues
📱 FIXED: Download notifications persist when app is closed
🎬 FIXED: Video player black screen after app switching
🚀 Intelligent auto-pause when downloads encounter issues
💾 Enhanced progress preservation with 3 layers of protection
⚡ Foreground service support for reliable background downloads
� Improved video player lifecycle with texture recreation
